meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uncouth.
meanings.sent1: Her uncouthness was evident in the way she slurped her soup.
meanings.sent2: The uncouthness of his manners made him stand out in the elegant ballroom.
meanings.sent3: Despite his uncouthness, he managed to charm everyone with his genuine smile.
meanings.sent4: The uncouthness of the old building added to its mysterious allure.
meanings.sent5: The uncouthness of the dog's bark startled the quiet neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The uncouthness of his speech shocked the audience.
meanings.sent2: She tried to hide her uncouthness by imitating the manners of the nobility.
meanings.sent3: His uncouthness at the fancy restaurant caused quite a stir among the other diners.
meanings.sent4: The uncouthness of the graffiti on the wall was a stark contrast to the elegant architecture.
meanings.sent5: The uncouthness of his behavior was a constant source of embarrassment for his family.
